text: Julio Cesar Martinez Aguilar (born 27 January 1995) is a Mexican professional boxer who has held the WBC flyweight title since 2019. ==Personal Life== Julio Cesar Martinez Aguilar was born 27 January 1995 in Mexico City and raised in its Tepito neighborhood. ==Professional career== Martinez turned professional in 2015 and compiled a record of 14-1 before facing and defeating British Boxer Charlie Edwards, to win the WBC Flyweight title. The result was however overturned due to Martinez landing an illegal shot on Edwards. Charlie Edwards then vacated the WBC Flyweight title and Martinez was then matched against Cristofer Rosales for the belt. Martinez became champion after a technical knockout stoppage in the ninth round. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! !Result !Record !Opponent !Type
